alert.note: Alert for Bell; Bosque; Coryell; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 10:23PM CDT until May 19 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McLennan County in central Texas... Central Coryell County in central Texas... Southeastern Bosque County in central Texas... North central Bell County in central Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gatesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gatesville, McGregor, Moody, Valley Mills, Crawford, Mother Neff State Park, Fort Gates, Belton Lake, Oglesby, South Mountain, Whitson, Osage, Arnett, Hurst Springs, Pancake, Levita, Meadow Grove, Mound, The Grove and Coryell City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
